text: It ’ s official : Nashville will strum its last chord on Thursday, July 26. The country - music drama will return for the series ’ final eight episodes on Thursday, June 7, at 9 / 8c, CMT announced just after the midseason finale aired Thursday. As usual, all episodes will be available to stream on Hulu the day after they air. In addition, Nashville will add two recurring guest stars in the last batch of episodes. Mia Maestro ( Alias, The Strain ) will play Rosa, a true - believer member of The Movement for Coherent Philosophy who is starting to doubt her involvement in the organization.
